recipe_text: Quantity; 680; Prepare 680 grams of chicken breast, cut into cubes| Measurement; 60; Measure out 60 grams of olive oil| Measurement; 60; Measure out 60 grams of lemon juice| Measurement; 10; Measure out 10 grams of garlic, minced| Measurement; 5; Measure out 5 grams of oregano| Measurement; 5; Measure out 5 grams of salt| Measurement; 2; Measure out 2 grams of black pepper| Quantity; 2; Prepare 2 bell peppers, cut into chunks| Quantity; 1; Prepare 1 onion, cut into chunks| Untimed; None; In a bowl, whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, oregano, salt, and black pepper| Untimed; None; Add chicken cubes to the marinade and toss to coat| Untimed; None; Cover and refrigerate for at least 1 hour| Untimed; None; Preheat grill to medium-high heat| Untimed; None; Thread marinated chicken, bell peppers, and onion onto skewers| Timed; 1200; Grill kabobs for 10 minutes, turning occasionally| Finish; None; Serve hot!
title: Marinated Greek Chicken Kabobs
